title: tiruvuLLa karuttenna
sahitya:
tiruvuLLa karuttena sholvIr inda ariyadOr yAkkai Akkiya tangaL


anupallavi

  peralarum piraiviyai-peravaruL shurandIr marumurai piravA neri shela vaittIrO


caraNam    UnuDal vaLarkkavum ulaginbam tuykkavum vINil alaiginrEn vEredum purigilEn 
arivarum aDiyiNai aDaivadE kuriyenrAl shirumati tandadEn shiva paramporuLE
